mapper.select: SELECT d.delivery_code, d.order_date, d.dedt, count(t.product_code) as deliveryQy FROM delivery d join DELIVERY_PRODUCT_DETAILS t on d.delivery_code = t.delivery_code group by t.product_code, d.delivery_code, d.order_date, d.dedt

SELECT d.delivery_code, p.product_name, d.delivery_qy FROM delivery_product_details d join product_info p on d.product_code = p.product_code WHERE product_se = 'PT02' and delivery_code = #{deliveryCode}
